channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Hosting -- Pay with Vipps and MobilePay for WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Hosting -- Pay with Vipps and MobilePay for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2023-51485|2024-06-27T20:43:57.550Z -- wp%20hosting -- pay%20with%20vipps%20and%20mobilepay%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Hosting Pay with Vipps and MobilePay for WooCommerce allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Pay with Vipps and MobilePay for WooCommerce: from n/a through 1.14.13.

item.title: CVE-2023-51485|2024-02-10T08:30:34.274Z -- wp%20hosting -- pay%20with%20vipps%20and%20mobilepay%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Hosting Pay with Vipps and MobilePay for WooCommerce allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Pay with Vipps and MobilePay for WooCommerce: from n/a through 1.14.13.
